timeline: Day 4-5 after Chapter 1 (vault discovery and aftermath)
location: Deep city vault, then Jax's squat in Sector 4

knows: The vault contains Earth currency worth potentially billions
Physical Earth currency is extinct and incredibly valuable to collectors
The Collector exists and deals in high-value Earth artifacts
They have a meeting scheduled for next night at 23:00
This could change everything or get them killed
Location of the vault in deep city
How to access black market networks
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Cautiously hopeful but paranoid, feeling possibility for the first time
Jax Varro.physical_state: Exhausted from 6-hour journey through deep city, anxious but focused

knows: They're Jax's backup for the meet
Finn.emotional_state: Cautiously excited, loyal, protective of Jax

revealed_to_reader: The vault contains physical Earth currency - bills and coins
Physical currency has been extinct for 500 years (replaced by digital credits)
Earth artifacts are incredibly valuable to collectors
Multiple Earth currencies present: American dollars, Yuan, Euro, Yen, others
Estimated face value of 50 million old dollars, worth billions to collectors
The Collector - mysterious fence who deals in Earth artifacts
Black market networks and encrypted forums exist in the station
Deep city sections from before the Sealing exist
Jax is intelligent and resourceful despite limited formal education
Finn and Jax trust each other deeply
The station's rotation has slowed in deep sections, affecting gravity

planted.significance: Will be the fence who makes Jax rich
Establishing their dynamic and Finn's protective nature
Character depth, will be important for later planning
Ongoing resource, will be revealed in Book 3 as revolutionary base

planted.element: Jax's fear that hope hurts more than hopelessness
planted.significance: Foreshadows his emotional state when trapped despite wealth

active_tensions: Extreme value of discovery versus danger of being caught
Meeting with unknown Collector - could be trap
Paranoia about being robbed or killed
First real hope but fear of it being destroyed
Trust between Jax and Finn versus distrust of everyone else
Moving valuable goods through dangerous territory
world_changes: Jax and Finn now possess potentially billions in Earth currency
First contact made with The Collector
